name: Mushroomba
description:
[GLOBAL GAME JAM SUBMISSION 2023]

DESCRIPTION

Play as a roomba* infested with mushrooms and spread your spores around the neighbourhood, but watch out for cats! 

*robot vacuum cleaner/lawn mower

CONTROLS

Move - WASD

GAMEPLAY

- Explore the neighbourhood whilst trying to spread as many spores as possible

- Discover where spores thrive the best

- Avoid the patrolling cat!

-Play until your battery runs out

FEATURES

- Retro pixel-art graphics

- See your progress with a full map view at the end 

TEAM

Producer - Rhiannon Nash

Programmer - Ewan Fisher

Programmer & Audio - Calum Sarjeant

Artist & Animator - Henry Neff

Artist & Animator - Amy Coates-Walker

Artist - Rebekah Beattie

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER!

https://twitter.com/YellowCrowGames

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

Download and extract zip file and locate the 'Mushroomba.exe' file. Run the exe file to start the game. (Press "Run Anyway" if windows anti-virus software activates.
